channel.title: My ace pk area just about finished?
channel.description:
Ok i have made a pk area in the wildy i have 2 questions
1: How do i make a safe zone
2: theres 2 ways they can escape into the whole widly i need to block those places with trees i forgot how to though .
Can someone please help me out

item.title: My ace pk area just about finished?
item.dc:creator: @mostadaman mostadaman
item.description:
@mostadaman wrote:

for no 2
open up client.java
hit ctrl+f
and look for
makeglobalobject or Addglobalobject
u should see some thing like this
makeGlobalObject(3203, 3428, 7273, 0, 10);//

makeGlobalObject(****, &&&&, ^^^^, 0, 10);//

ok now the **** is the x coords and the &&&& is the y coords
the ^^^^ is the object id
the 0 is the direction
and the 10 well u just leave it like that
hope it helped?

Read full topic
item.source: My ace pk area just about finished?
